attributes.action: trade embargo on china to stop the demand for ivory, no demand=no supply
attributes.additional_details: the trade in ivory MUST stop, the slaughter of elephants and rhino only occurs because of demand, pressure MUST be put on countries that do not outlaw demand for this product, CHINA is the biggest that their middle class citizens demand ivory for their trinkets. if there is no demand, there is no need to supply, help save these primative, social creatures from extinction
